name: RandomActsofKindness-ChristmasEdition
0:
”Alexa, open RAK Christmas”
”tell me the act for today”
”Next Saturday”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: rak christmas
Developer Terms of Use
des: Welcome to Random Acts of Kindness - Christmas Edition. The world is a nicer place when filled with acts of kindness. Alexa can provide you with acts to perform at Christmas. Say 'Today' to hear today's act or tell Alexa a specific date "12th of December" or even date related phrases "Tomorrow", "Next Friday", "Christmas Eve". Don't worry if its not December yet Alexa will give you a sneak peak
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
